thread.title: "Birthday Present"
thread.title_full: "Birthday Present" - Review of Eiffel Saint Charles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AFL61
title: "Birthday Present"
text: First let me say this hotel is in a fantastic location,when you get to know the area its great,Metro on your doorstep,shops,and a great Bistro 100 yards away(Cafe Dupleix),the rooms aren't massive,but its everything you need,comfy beds,great bathroom...the staff are really friendly and helpful,the location and area are everything we hoped for from a Paris break,will come here again someday I hope.
